Rage: Eagle Heart

Enter a Rage that makes you near untouchable.You can use Diving Strike.

Foes also have Disadvantage on Opportunity Attacks against you, and you can use Dash as a bonus action.10 turns.

Class needed:Wildheart

Go into a Rage that grants you extraordinary swiftness.

You can use Primal Stampede, and your Movement speed increases by 4.5m.10 turns.
